short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility for performance debugging with servicenow instance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This utility is designed to significantly streamline the work of ServiceNow performance debuggers. It offers a robust platform for automating common workflows, enhancing performance debugging visualisations, and accelerating the debugging process. Notably, no setup is required on the ServiceNow instance itself, making it universally applicable across any instance. Additionally, it features a flexible framework that allows for seamless integration of new features as needed.
